back_cards.example_en: Hey, how’s it going?
Hey, watch where you’re walking!
Hey, come look at this view!
Hey, I didn’t know you could sing!
Hey, good to see you again!
I thank you for the lovely gift.
She thanked the team for their help.
He thanked her for the ride home.
They thanked the volunteers.
We thank our sponsors for support.
